DOC.brief_summary: To study efficacy safety naproxcinod vs. placebo naproxen treatment sign symptom Osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Efficacy Safety Study Naproxcinod Subjects With Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.detailed_description: This 13-week double-blind study follow 52-week , open-label , roll-over active treatment study . These randomize , parallel group , multicenter study compare efficacy safety naproxcinod , placebo naproxen .
DOC.criteria: Men woman ( 40 old ) diagnosis primary OA knee Must current chronic user NSAIDS acetaminophen Must discontinue analgesic therapy screen Uncontrolled hypertension diabetes Hepatic renal impairment Current expect use anticoagulant A history alcohol drug abuse Candidates imminent joint replacement Diagnosis gastric duodenal ulceration and/or history significant gastroduodenal bleeding , within last 6 month Current medical disease could confound interfere evaluation efficacy Participation within 30 day prior screen another investigational study
